n = int(input())

t = [0]*n
x = [0]*n
y = [0]*n
for i in range(n):
    t[i], x[i], y[i] = map(int, input().split())

for i in range(1, n):
    if abs(x[i]-x[i-1]) + abs(y[i]-y[i-1]) > t[i]-t[i-1]:
        print('No')
        exit()
    if (t[i]-t[i-1])%2 != (abs(x[i]-x[i-1]) + abs(y[i]-y[i-1]))%2:
        print('No')
        exit()

print('Yes')
n = int(input())
t_list = []
x_list = []
y_list = []
for i in range(n):
    t, x, y = map(int, input().split())
    t_list.append(t)
    x_list.append(x)
    y_list.append(y)
for i in range(n):
    d = t_list[i] - (abs(x_list[i] - x_list[i - 1]) + abs(y_list[i] - y_list[i - 1]))
    if d < 0 or d % 2 != 0:
        print("No")
        exit()
print("Yes")

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t_list = []
    x_list = []
    y_list = []
    for i in range(n):
        t, x, y = map(int, input().split())
        t_list.append(t)
        x_list.append(x)
        y_list.append(y)
    x = 0
    y = 0

for i in range(n):
    d = t_list[i] - (abs(x_list[i] - x) + abs(y_list[i] - y))
    if d < 0 or d % 2 != 0:
        print("No")
    x = x_list[i]
    y = y_list[i]
        exit()
print("Yes")


def main():
    n = int(input())
    t_list = []
    x_list = []
    y_list = []
    for i in range(n):
        t, x, y = map(int, input().split())
        t_list.append(t)
        x_list.append(x)
        y_list.append(y)

    for i in range(n):
        d = t_list[i] - (abs(x_list[i] - x_list[i - 1]) + abs(y_list[i] - y_list[i - 1]))
        if d < 0 or d % 2 != 0:
            print("No")
            exit()
    print("Yes")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    t_list = []
    x_list = []
    y_list = []
    for i in range(n):
        t, x, y = map(int, input().split())
        t_list.append(t)
        x_list.append(x)
        y_list.append(y)
    x = 0
    y = 0

for i in range(n):
    d = t_list[i] - (abs(x_list[i] - x) + abs(y_list[i] - y))
    if d < 0 or d % 2 != 0:
        print("No")
        exit()
print("Yes")

    y_list.append(y)

for i in range(1, n):

n = int(input())

t = [0]*(n+1)
x = [0]*n
y = [0]*n
for i in range(n):
    t[i], x[i], y[i] = map(int, input().split())
for i in range(1, n+1):
    if abs(x[i]-x[i-1]) + abs(y[i]-y[i-1]) > t[i]-t[i-1]:
        print('No')
        exit()
    if (t[i]-t[i-1]) % 2 != (abs(x[i]-x[i-1]) + abs(y[i]-y[i-1])) % 2:
        print('No')
        exit()

print('Yes')
